work.lc_subject: Brooks/Redner; Calkin/Longfellow; German Carol/Jungst; German Melody/Latin; Gruber/Mohr; Hopkins; Mason/Watts; McFarland/Murray/Tr; Mendelssohn/Wesley; Oakeley/Wade; Sandys; Schultz; Sears/Willis; Traditional
work.synopsis: This companion disc to Cantos De Navidad by Cedarmont (a company specializing in Spanish language Bible-based musical audiovisual materials for children) is the far superior one for two reasons: each song is recognizable, despite the fact that "Joy to the World" somehow translates to "Al Mundo Paz" (a peaceful world), and all the songs are choir-based rather than featuring very poor soloists. The arrangements and production by Sue and Mike Gay are simple but effective piano-, chime-, and horn-based number. After the initial 15 tracks, the song sequence repeats with vocal and instrumental tracks on different channels so that children can sing along without the recorded vocals. This possibility makes this disc worth the listen even for English speaking audiences. ~ Jonathan Widran, Rovi
work.title: Christmas Carols

work.synopsis: Gospel Praise Songs is a Cedarmont collection containing 17 traditional gospel songs intended for children to sing and learn, many kept under two minutes in length, making the process easier. The disc uses a split track format in which the initial 17 songs feature The Cedarmont Kids, then the tracks are repeated at the end of the disc without the vocals, encouraging home or church sing-alongs. ~ Al Campbell, Rovi
work.title: Gospel Praise Songs
